about_the_game:
Chaos Chain

The Kickstart Kit DLC is for people who'd like to start the game off with a kickstart and help us out further, rewarding your character with some extra starting gear to give them a head start into their adventures in Slade City. These items are rewarded as soon as the DLC is activated - NO NEW GAME NECESSARY!

Contents:
  • 5x Memory Chips - Extra memory chips which allow you to save the game anytime and anywhere you wish!
  • 65x Cred - Cred is the currency in Chaos Chain, needed for just about anything and everything!
  • 1x Soda - Not the healthiest drink in the world, but it's refreshing for you in such dark times!
  • 1x Artificial Meat - Bland, mushy, and smells like plastic, but it'll keep you fed!
  • 1x Pain Pills - Fight off the pain of a hard day in Slade City with these little wonder pills!
  • 1x Splint - A quick solution to fix an injury which caused trauma to a character!
  • 1x Bandage - Patch yourself up and stop your bleeding with an extra bandage!

PLEASE NOTE: THERE ARE TWO WAYS TO ACTIVATE THIS DLC IN GAME. YOU DO NOT NEED TO START A NEW GAME!
---
  • 1 - TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK WITH A *NEW* CHARACTER, JUST CREATE YOUR CHARACTER AND THE DLC WILL AUTOMATICALLY ACTIVATE AFTER CHARACTER CREATION!
  • 2 - TO RECEIVE THE ITEMS FROM THIS PACK WITH A *SAVED* CHARACTER, YOU MUST USE THE PDA ITEM IN YOUR INVENTORY AND SELECT "ACTIVATE DLC".
  • AFTER - THEY CAN THEN BE FOUND IN YOUR STORAGE STASH! YOU CAN GET THE ITEMS ANYTIME YOU WISH!

[/list]
